verse: The ·Lord spoke his word [word of the Lord came] to me, saying:
“·Human [Son of man; 2:1], prophesy and say, ‘This is what the Lord God says:

Cush, Put, ·Lydia [Lud; 27:10], all ·Arabia [or all the foreigners; or all the mercenaries], ·Libya [Kub], and ·some of my people who had made an agreement with Egypt [or the people of allied lands; the sons of the land of the covenant] will fall ·dead in war [by the sword with them].

“‘·At that time [On that day] I will send messengers in ships to frighten Cush [Ethiopia], which ·now feels safe [is over-confident; or is complacent]. ·The people of Cush will tremble with fear [Anguish will come upon them] ·when Egypt is punished [in the day of Egypt]. And [look; behold] that time is sure to come.
“‘This is what the Lord God says:

It was in the eleventh year [since King Jehoiachin’s exile (1:2)], in the first month, on the seventh day of the month [April 29, 587 bc]. The ·Lord spoke his word [word of the Lord came] to me, saying:

“·Human [Son of man; 2:1], I have broken the ·powerful arm [arm] of Pharaoh, the king of Egypt. It has not been ·tied [bound] up, so it will not get well. It has not been wrapped with a bandage, so it will not be strong enough to hold a sword in war.
So this is what the Lord God says: [Look; Behold] I am against Pharaoh, the king of Egypt. I will break his arms, both the strong arm and the broken arm, and I will make the sword fall from his hand.
I will scatter the Egyptians among the nations, spreading them among the countries.

I will make the arms of the king of Babylon strong and put my sword in his hand. But I will break the arms of Pharaoh. Then ·when he faces the king of Babylon [before him] he will ·cry out in pain [groan] like a ·dying [mortally wounded] person.

So I will make the arms of the king of Babylon strong, but the arms of the king of Egypt will ·fall [become limp]. Then people will know that I am the Lord when I put my sword into the hand of the king of Babylon and he ·uses it in war [wields it; extends it] against the land of Egypt.
Then I will scatter the Egyptians among the nations, spreading them among the countries. Then they will know that I am the Lord.”
